mapper.sql: hospital_name, hospital_level, hospital_key_specialty, hospital_brief_introduce, hospital_introduce, hospital_telephone, hospital_addredd_pro, hospital_address_city, hospital_address_country, hospital_address, hospital_link, hospital_status, creater, itemCreateAt, itemUpdateAt, org_code
mapper.insert: insert into tb_culpro_hosp (hospital_name, hospital_level, hospital_brief_introduce, hospital_key_specialty, hospital_telephone, hospital_link, hospital_address, hospital_introduce) values (#{hospital_name}, #{hospital_level}, #{hospital_brief_introduce}, #{hospital_key_specialty}, #{hospital_telephone}, #{hospital_link}, #{hospital_address}, #{hospital_introduce})
